Item.Value: Hi. $Name$, right?, Welcome to River Hollow. I'm $Character_6$ and it's my job to make sure the monsters stay outside the walls. I recommend you not wander far from town.
$Name$, hello. Having a good day I trust? Stay safe, and don't make me follow you around.
$Name$? You look stressed. Please don't push yourself and make sure you're getting enough sleep. a few years back I tried six hours a night and let me tell you what a mistake that was.
Oh, thank you. I really appreciate this.
Is that really for me? $Name$! Thank you. This really means a lot to me.
Hello, what can I do for you?.{Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%Friend:50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Cancel}
Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.
Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.
You're running around in this rain? Ha, of course you are. There's no stopping you, is there? It's admirable, if concerning.
